{"id":1263819871,"question_id":3265,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1716279995,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1263819871/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Good Subarray Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long maximumSubarraySum(int[] nums, int k) {\n\n        int len = nums.length;\n\n        Map<Long, Integer> map = new HashMap<>(); // presum , idx\n        int[] presum = new int[len];\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            presum[i] = i==0 ? nums[i] : presum[i-1] + nums[i];\n        }\n\n        map.put(0L, -1);\n        long sum =0, res = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n\n            sum += nums[i];\n            \n            if(map.containsKey(sum-k)){\n\n                if(map.get(sum-k)==-1 || map.get(sum-k)-1==-1)\n                    res = Math.max(res, sum);\n                else\n                    res = Math.max(res, sum-presum[map.get(sum-k)-1]);\n            }\n\n            if(map.containsKey(sum+k)){\n\n                if(map.get(sum+k)==-1 || map.get(sum+k)-1==-1)\n                    res = Math.max(res, sum);\n                else\n                    res = Math.max(res, sum-presum[map.get(sum+k)-1]);\n            }\n\n\n            if(!map.containsKey(sum) || sum< presum[map.get(sum)] )\n                map.put(sum , i);\n        }\n\n        return res;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-good-subarray-sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
